Detailed Description

template<typename T, unsigned int ARR_LEN>
class par::Mpi_datatype< ot::NodeAndValues< T, ARR_LEN > >

A template specialization of the abstract class "Mpi_datatype" for communicating messages of type "ot::NodeAndValues<T, unsigned int>".
